category: Accounting Regulations/Article 34 (Submission of budget request and budget proposal)
contents: Article 34 (Submission of budget request and budget proposal) ① The sector budget manager must prepare the relevant budget request in accordance with the budget preparation guidelines and submit it to the budget manager by September 30 of the previous year., ② The budget manager must prepare the budget request for each sector. After comprehensively reviewing and adjusting the budget request, a budget plan must be prepared, approved by the board of directors, and submitted to the Minister of Health and Welfare by October 31 of the previous year. ③ In the case where part or all of the corporation's management and operating expenses are covered by national treasury subsidies, Notwithstanding the provisions of paragraphs 1 and 2, the budget manager of each division must prepare a budget request for the following year and submit it to the budget manager by April 30, and the budget manager shall compile a budget plan by comprehensively adjusting the budget request for each sector. It must be submitted to the Minister of Health and Welfare by May 31. Revised 2021. 8. 26.
